edu.metrostate.ics372.thatgroup.clinicaltrial.patient

Class ClinicalPatient

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.metrostate.ics372.thatgroup.clinicaltrial.patient.Patient
      • edu.metrostate.ics372.thatgroup.clinicaltrial.patient.ClinicalPatient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ClinicalPatient
extends Patient
    The Patient class represents a patient in a clinical trial. Because of this, the patient contains an id and a journal that contains all of the Readings for the patient. Additionally, the patient has a trial start and end date to track when they enter and leave the clinical trial.

    Notes:

    • If the trial end date has been set for the patient, then when you activate the add method, the date of the reading must be on or before the end date of the trial.
    Author:
    See Also:

        id - the new id for this patient

        startDate - the date this patient entered the trial
        endDate - the date this patient left the trial

    • Method Detail

      • addReading

        public boolean addReading(Reading reading)
        Adds a new Reading to this patient's journal.

        Notes:

        • If the trial end date has been set for the patient, then when you activate the add method, the date of the reading must be on or before the end date of the trial.
        • The patient id of the reading is updated to be equal to this patient's id before it is added to the journal.
        Specified by:
        addReading in class Patient
        Parameters:
        reading - The reading to add to this patient's journal. If the reading is already in the journal it will not be added again. The reading must also not be null and must have a valid date.
        Returns:
        true if the reading was added to this patient's journal; otherwise false is returned.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Patient
